SELECT devName as equip, SC_PART as part, SC_CONTENT AS spot, RESULT AS value, ID as id, std_value as standard, uploadResultTime as time, ( CASE WHEN ALTPID = 1 THEN "二级" WHEN ALTPID = 2 THEN "一级" END ) level, (CASE WHEN alarm_flag="N" THEN '未处理' WHEN alarm_flag="Y" THEN '已处理' END) flag FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE
( ROUTE_NAME='尾砂泵' OR ROUTE_NAME='2系统压滤、过滤机' OR ROUTE_NAME='压滤、过滤机' OR ROUTE_NAME='压滤机岗' OR ROUTE_NAME='过滤机岗')
and ALTPID !=0 -- and alarm_flag='N' AND date(uploadResultTime) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) ORDER BY COMPLETE_TM DESC
